au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L1=L2=20m_8.9Alens
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to long position driveDet(19280,0) # Drive guide to lens config driveGuide(guideConfig.lens) # Drive entrance aperture to 0 (for lens) driveEntRotAp(0) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', -72) # Drive beamstops up selBs(6)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(42.8, 100) # Drive attenuator to 120 driveAtt(120)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(42.8, 0) driveBsz(239.4)
